trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute that specifies the scope where a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object should be applied when a resource is located.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class parses and generates code during compilation for a resource that has a specific file.
The FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute attribute defines the location scope for which the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object will be called.

By setting the FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute attribute, you can limit a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object to certain [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] directories, such as App_Code.
If you do not apply a FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute attribute to a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class, by default, the attribute targets all directories.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute"></xref> class.
The target directory that a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object applies to.
Gets or sets the target directory that a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object applies to.
The directory that a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object applies to.
